rocketchatURL.description: URL of the Rocket.Chat instance to connect to. Can be specified as host:port

rocketchatRoom.description: Receive messages from these channels names.

rocketchatAuth.description: Default is password. Set to ldap to enable LDAP login for bot users.

rocketchatUser.description: The bot’s username. Must be registered on your Rocket.Chat server and granted bot role.

rocketchatUseSSL.description: Force bot to connect with SSL. If unset, it will try and detect from URL protocol.

respondToDM.description: Specify if your bot will respond to direct messages

respondToEdited.description: Stream callbacks receive edited messages (true/false). Defaults to false.

respondToLivechat.description: Stream callbacks receive messages from Livechat (true/false). Defaults to false.

listenOnAllPublic.description: Stream callbacks receive messages from all public channels (true/false). Defaults to false (only rooms the bot has joined).
